enter-your-information,-connect-your-wal:
Enter your information, connect your wallet, and make a $100 USDC refundable deposit to reserve your spot on the waitlist. When your payment is received, you will be added to the waitlist and notified when it is time to complete your order.

To be added to the POOLS waitlist, a $100 USDC deposit is required. The depsit will be deducted from the final purchase price of the POOLS Phone.
